Ixworth Library

Manager: Cathy McDonald

Village Hall, High Street, Ixworth
IP31 2HH

Tel: 01359 231493
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Ixworth Library

Social media:

Ixworth Library to close for refurbishment from 10 to 24 April

Branch facilities

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Borrow iPad

Tuesday, 0945-1030

Craft activities: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1130-1230

Tuesday, 1330-1415

Sunday, 1400-1530
